SN Discovery Date Name Start End Type Payment Type Case Original Amt O/S Amt Letter {{ i + 1 }} {{ record.discoveryDate }} {{ record.name }} {{ record.periodStart }} {{ record.periodEnd }} {{ record.type }} {{ record.paymentType }} {{ record.caseId }} {{ record.originalAmt }} {{ record.osAmt }} {{ record.letter }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-company-overpayment-tab', templateUrl: './company-overpayment-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-overpayment-tab.component.scss'] }) export class CompanyOverpaymentTabComponent implements OnInit { displayRefundHistoryDialog: any = { display: false }; displayRefundDetailsDialog: any = { display: false }; displayPaymentTransactionHistoryDialog: any = { display: false }; sampleData = [ { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", periodStart: "20-08-2021", periodEnd: "29-09-2021", type: "CHANGE IN TRAINING PERIOD", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "E121-1024", originalAmt: "123.45", osAmt: "128.45", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", periodStart: "20-07-2021", periodEnd: "29-08-2021", type: "CHANGE IN SERVICE PAY", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "E121-1023", originalAmt: "234.56", osAmt: "239.56", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", periodStart: "20-06-2021", periodEnd: "29-07-2021", type: "CHANGE IN AWARDS/ALLOWANCE", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "E121-1022", originalAmt: "345.67", osAmt: "350.67", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", periodStart: "20-05-2021", periodEnd: "29-06-2021", type: "CHANGE IN MUP (NA ADJUSTMENTS)", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "E121-1021", originalAmt: "0.00", osAmt: "0.00", letter: "10-11-2021"} ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } }
